alert.note: Alert for Christian; Menard; Morgan; Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 9:05AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Menard, northwestern Christian, Sangamon and east central Morgan Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 905 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Athens to near Alexander. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Sherman around 915 AM CDT. Rochester, Riverton and Loami around 920 AM CDT. Chatham around 925 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Springfield, Auburn, Mechanicsburg, Divernon, Pawnee and Mount Auburn. This includes the following highways... Interstate 55 between mile markers 80 and 104. Interstate 72 between mile markers 72 and 113. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
